viewData.name: LG UK6300PUE 55" Class HDR UHD Smart IPS LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG UK6300PUE 55" Class HDR UHD Smart IPS LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 IPS LED Panel, HDR10 & HLG Support TruMotion 120 Digital Motion Enhancement. Review LG UK6300
viewData.long_description: Enjoy UHD HDR video with compatible content and the LG UK6300PUE 55" Class HDR UHD Smart IPS LED TV. The 54.6" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 3840 x 2160, allowing you to view UHD images, and the 60 Hz refresh rate with TruMotion 120 technology helps reduce the blur commonly associated with fast-moving, on-screen objects. It can display HLG and HDR10 video with compatible source devices and content. Its three HDMI inputs allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
